title: Indian fantasy
brief_description: Intended as one episode in a full length animated and colour feature cartoon of Jules Verne’s “Round the World in Eighty Days”, this sequence shows the beginning and end of the journey and the adventures of Phileas Fogg and his servant in India. The film was commenced in 1938 but was not completed.
